Package main

Class GameEnvironment

java.lang.Object
main.GameEnvironment
public class GameEnvironment extends Object
The main game manager. Holds the generic information about the game.
Author:
Farzad and Daniel

    • setupGame

      public void setupGame()
      Create the necessary objects to run the game. 1. Sets default balance. 2. Sets default score.

    • populateGame

      public void populateGame()
      Populate the necessary game information. 1. Set starting balance and starting score based on the level of difficulty selected by the player. 2. Setup allMonsters and allItems. 3. Setup the shop and randomize it. 4. Setup battles and randomize it.

    • sleep

      public String sleep()
      Sleep through the night. 1. Check the status of the game. 2. Randomize the shop 3. Randomize battles 4. Heal all player monsters. 5. Reset the number of today's battles.
      Returns:
      the commentary of events that happened over night.

    • checkStatus

      public void checkStatus()
      Set the value of isFinished to true if the number of days has reached numDays.

    • getInstance

      public static GameEnvironment getInstance()
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of GameEnvironment
